name: Touch Locker - touch lock app
description: How can I put my phone in my pocket without turning the screen off and avoid accidental touches? How can I let my child watch videos on my phone without touching anything? Youre in the right place! Download Touch Locker - touch lock now to solve all these problems!  Touch Locker - touch lock is an app that allows you to lock the touchscreen. There are many touch lock apps on playstore. This one only wants to be a simpler, faster and full of useful options!  What can I do with Touch Locker - touch lock? -lock the touchscreen and resume it when you want with a long press on the screen. You can customize the duration of the long press required to unlock the touchscreen, choose to show or not an icon during the unlock long press, choose to keep the screen always on during the lock and more! -start the touch screen lock from a widget -start the touch screen lock from a notification  STAY UPDATED To stay updated about Touch Locker - touch lock app and my other projects: bit.ly/2Sx96Uh  Enjoy Touch Locker - touch lock! :D
